title: KK OSPREY
description: 3D model from GeoSabah 3D Hub (Kota Kinabalu area).

title: Kota Kinabalu City Centre
description: High-resolution drone photogrammetry 3D model of Kota Kinabalu city centre including commercial buildings and urban infrastructure.

title: Kota Kinabalu Waterfront
description: Coastal drone capture of Kota Kinabalu waterfront including marina, shoreline, and coastal infrastructure.

title: Likas Bay Area
description: Drone mapping of Likas Bay including beach zones, coastal vegetation, and shoreline protection structures.

title: Tanjung Aru Zone
description: Urban-coastal drone capture of Tanjung Aru including residential zones, resorts, and transportation corridors.

title: Teluk Likas Coastal Strip
description: Drone survey of Teluk Likas coastline including beach morphology and coastal erosion mapping.
